relation: A drawing of everybody's favorite Chosen Four, tensing up before a big battle.
The Starman in training appears to do battle with Ness, and Buzz Buzz is...not present...for some reason...
Your standard crossover pic, starring Kirby. And Ness is in his pajamas. Yup.
Bottom of the ninth, home team in the field, visitors at bat, scores are tied, bases loaded, two outs, three balls, two strikes.
As the shadow of some unknown entity approaches her from behind, Paula reaches for her pan, ever so slowly...
